question: Match the following:
columnB: Finger-like projections which help in collection of the ovum
Funnel-shaped part of oviduct closer to the ovary

answer.Infundibulum: Funnel-shaped part of oviduct closer to the ovary
answer.Fimbriae: Finger-like projections which help in collection of the ovum

question: Match the following:
columnB: Last part of oviduct with narrow lumen

answer.Isthmus: Last part of oviduct with narrow lumen

question: Match the following:
columnB: External thin membranous layer of uterus
Middle thick layer of smooth muscle in uterus
Narrow opening of uterus into vagina

answer.Cervix: Narrow opening of uterus into vagina
answer.Perimetrium: External thin membranous layer of uterus
answer.Myometrium: Middle thick layer of smooth muscle in uterus

question: Match the following:
columnB: Undergoes cyclical changes during menstrual cycle
Exhibits strong contraction during delivery of the baby
Supported by ligaments attached to the pelvic wall

answer.Function of endometrium: Undergoes cyclical changes during menstrual cycle
answer.Function of myometrium: Exhibits strong contraction during delivery of the baby
answer.Support of uterus: Supported by ligaments attached to the pelvic wall
